name: SpaceBooom
description:
2D shooter set in space. IN DEVELOPMENT -DEMO ONLY- 

TO PLAY UNZIP -> GOTO FOlder SPACEEXP-WIN32-x64 and run the spaceexp.exe

Move to the door to get to the next level -7 levels currently 

--CONTROLS--

WASD - To Move

SHIFT - To sprint

MOUSELEFT- To shoot

1 to 9 - To switch weapons
